original: $WHO$ dislikes us, so we cannot ask them. They need to have a positive opinion of us, and it is currently $VAL$.

original: It is not possible to start a new war within the first month of having started a previous one.
translation: 在前一场战争开始的第一个月之内你不能发动另一场战争。

original: It is not possible to start a new war while fighting an independence war.

original: They have no shipbuilding capacity so cannot be used for basing.

original: We have no shipbuilding capacity so cannot be used for basing.
translation: 我国没有造船能力，所以无法提供港口。

original: Both countries need to be at peace for an integration to progress.

original: Both countries need to be at peace for an annexation to progress.
translation: 两国需同时处于和平状态才可进行吞并。

original: Annexation will not progress while they don't control their capital.

original: $TAKER|Y$ has conditional military access through $GIVER|Y$ for the following reason(s):\n
translation: $GIVER|Y$给予$TAKER|Y$有条件的军事通行权，原因如下：\n

translation: $WHO|Y$给予$NAME|Y$舰队通行权。\n这赋予$NAME_ADJ|Y$在$WHO_ADJ|Y$港口中进行舰船维修的权利。

original: $WHO|Y$ has '$CB|Y$' casus belli against $NAME|Y$ ($DESC$).\n$WHO|Y$ may use this case a reason for declaring war against $NAME|Y$.

original: This casus belli is valid until §Y$DATE$§!.
You cannot declare war on a member of the Empire, if you are allied with the Emperor in a war.

original: You cannot declare war on a member of the Empire, if you are allied with the Emperor and the Emperor has recently gone to war.
translation: 如果你和皇帝结盟或皇帝刚刚进入战争，你无法对帝国成员宣战。

original: You cannot declare war on a member of the Empire, if you are already at war with the Emperor.
translation: 在结束与帝国皇帝的战争前，你不可对帝国成员发起新战争.

original: After the landfriede has been declared, no member of the Holy Roman Empire may take hostile actions towards another member.
translation: 在禁止复仇条例通过之后，神圣罗马帝国成员禁止相互宣战。

original: Our country is defended at $DEF|Y$ efficiency. This determines our chance of detecting and disrupting foreign agents that are constructing Spy Networks in our nation.\n$DEF_MOD$Our spies operate at $OFF|Y$ efficiency. This determines the speed with which we can build Spy Networks in other nations.\n$OFF_MOD$

This determines the speed with which they can build Spy Networks in other nations.\n$OFF_MOD$

translation: 由于我们的间谍被发现了，直到 $WHEN|Y$我们不能再派送新的间谍.

original: Our $ADJ|Y$ Spy Network is currently at size $SIZE|Y$ out of a maximum of §Y100§!.
translation: 我们的$ADJ|Y$间谍网目前的规模为$SIZE|Y$，上限为§Y100§!。

original: This gives us the following benefits:
§YOnly the highest technology cost reduction out of all your Spy Networks is used when buying technologies.§!
translation: §Y在支付科技花费时，你的所有间谍网中，只有科技花费减少最多的那个间谍网会被使用§!

original: Our $ADJ|Y$ Spy Network is currently at size $SIZE|Y$ out of a maximum of §Y100§!.
translation: 我们在$ADJ|Y$的间谍网目前的规模为$SIZE|Y$，上限为§Y100§!。

original: It will increase in size by $AMT|G$ every month.
It will decrease in size by $AMT|R$ every month.
Build a network of spies and informers in the target country.
translation: 在目标国家建立间谍网

original: Stop building a network of spies and informers in the target country.
translation: 停止在目标国家的建立间谍网

original: Send a diplomat to build up our network of spies and informants in $COUNTRY|Y$?
translation: 派遣一个外交官去$COUNTRY|Y$建立我们的间谍和情报员网络？

original: Send a diplomat to build up our network of spies and informants in $COUNTRY|Y$ and their subjects ($SUBJECTS$)?
translation: 派遣一个外交官去$COUNTRY|Y$和他们的附属($SUBJECTS$)建立我们的间谍和情报员网络？

original: They will increase the size of our Spy Network by $AMT|G$ each month.\n\nWhile our agent is active and the Spy Network is larger than §Y25§!, there is a §R$RISK$%§! risk of discovery each month. If we are discovered, it will damage relations with the target country, reduce the size of our network and prevent us from further growing it for a while.
translation: 这将每月提高我们的间谍网规模$AMT|G$。\n\n当我们的间谍活跃并且间谍网规模大于§Y25§!时，我们每个月被发现的风险为§R$RISK$%§!。如果我们被发现，将损害与目标国家的关系，减少我们网络的规模并在一段时间内阻止进一步增长。

original: Recall the agents building up our network of spies and informants in $COUNTRY|Y$? Our existing network will slowly decay when not actively being built up.
translation: 召回在$COUNTRY|Y$建立我们的谍报网的间谍？ 在不积极建设时我们现在的网络将缓慢衰退

original: $NAME$ is conducting Counterespionage in $PROV|Y$ ($COUNTRY|Y$). This increases our chance of detecting agents they send at us by $AMT$.
translation: $NAME$在$PROV|Y$ 执行反间谍行动（$COUNTRY|Y$），这增加了$AMT$我们发现他们派过来的间谍的机会。

original: As a Subject we cannot conduct counterespionage.
translation: 我们作为附庸国不能进行反间谍行动。

original: Send a diplomat to conduct counterespionage in the target country.
translation: 派个外交官在目标国家进行反间谍活动。

original: Recall your diplomat conducting counterespionage in the target country.
translation: 召回在目标国家进行反间谍活动的外交官。

original: Send a diplomat to conduct counterespionage in $COUNTRY|Y$? This will increase our chance of detecting any agents they send to us by $AMT$, and slow down their network by $SLOW$.
translation: 派一位外交官在$COUNTRY|Y$进行反间谍行动？这将使我们查出任何他们派来的间谍的机会提高$AMT$，并使他们建立间谍网的速度减慢$SLOW$。

original: Recall our diplomat that is conducting counterespionage in $COUNTRY|Y$? We will no longer have an increased chance of detecting their agents.
translation: 召回我们在$COUNTRY|Y$进行反间谍活动的外交官？我们将不再增加查出他们间谍的机会。

original: Negotiate peace with the entire alliance by negotiating with $COUNTRY|Y$, the war leader.
translation: 和对方盟主$COUNTRY|Y$谈判以和整个联盟媾和。

original: Sire, we have won a devastating victory over $ENEMY$ and have the possibility to annex them. However, this would greatly upset the rest of the $RELIGION$ world.
translation: 阁下，我们赢得了对$ENEMY$的完全胜利，可以完全将其吞并。但这将极大惹恼$RELIGION$的其他国家。

original: You have won a devastating victory. You could demand several provinces, a large amount of ducats, or dictate other conditions.
translation: 敌国现只能任我等随意宰割，割地纳贡皆在我国一念之间.

original: You have won a total victory. A demand of a province would most likely be accepted.
translation: 你获得了完全的胜利。割让对方某个省份的要求极有可能被接受。

original: You have won a victory. The enemy would most likely accept a white peace, or a minor settlement of ducats in exchange for peace.
translation: 你赢得了一场胜利. 你可以要求对方无条件和平，一少量战争赔款或其他条件.

original: The war is still undecided. Unless your enemy is eager to fight on, he would be likely to accept a white peace.
translation: 战争胜负未决. 如果敌人无心恋战，可能会接受无条件和平.

original: The enemy has won. You should offer them a minor sum of ducats or a province you can live without in return for peace.
translation: 敌人已经赢了，我们可以付出些许钱财、割让一个无关紧要省份作为换取和平的代价.

original: The enemy has won a total victory. You should offer them at least two provinces and a large amount of ducats in return for a peace.
translation: 敌人大获全胜。你得送出至少两个省份和大笔钱才能获得和平。

original: The enemy has won a devastating victory. You should offer them enough provinces to satisfy them, or this may turn out even worse.
translation: 敌人赢得了完全胜利. 想要和平你得提供多个省份，否则还会更糟.

original: We are utterly defeated, and the enemy can dictate any sort of peace he would like.
translation: 我们彻底失败，敌人可以随心所欲地处置我们.

original: Their people expect them to accept this peace deal, and if they refuse it it will cause great turmoil in their country.
translation: 他们的人民期望他们接受这项和平协议，如果他们拒绝的话，将会使其国内人民产生极大不满.

original: They demand our full Annexation. (Game Over)
translation: 对方要求全面吞并我国。（游戏结束）

original: White Peace. Nobody will gain or lose anything.
translation: 无条件和平。双方不会得到或失去什么。

original: $WHO$ will become a Tributary State of $BOSS$.

original: They are far too rich and powerful for our warnings to be taken seriously.

可耻的拒绝应召对抗$TARGET$的战争
